ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hi After finding out that jars dont fit into spits, I tried the recipie without the jar, and it works: Meat+Vinegar+Sauces in a spit What Jars really can
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 1
> Date: 7 Dec 1999 00:08:10 -0000
> From: BobbiS7@...
> Subject: Muddy Work

> I am curious about Jars and Pickling (Baking).
>
> Meat+Vinegar+Sauces in Jar.

Hi
After finding out that jars dont fit into spits, I
tried the recipie without the jar, and it works:
Meat+Vinegar+Sauces in a spit

What Jars really can be used for, except heavy
containers, beats me.

Captain Piip Ignatz
Pirates of Dark Tide
Innoruuk
